info.adminPanel: Admin Panel: Used to control user accounts, system settings, and monitor the system.
info.downloads: Downloads: The core system for users to access and manage downloads. Note: Setup in the Admin Panel must be completed first.
info.cognitahz: Cognitahz: A proprietary platform for users to consume their downloaded content, combining the best features from various platforms.
info.backups: Backups: Create backup tasks to different services you own or fetch files to your local machine.
